name: IPHONE 15
description: The iPhone 15 display has rounded corners that follows a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 15.54 cm (6.12″) diagonally (actual viewable area is less).The display has rounded corners that follow a curved design and is splash, water, and dust resistant. The iPhone 15 also has a Dynamic Island feature that replaces the notch from the iPhone X

name: iqoo Z6 Lite
description:
The iQOO Z6 Lite 5G is a smartphone with the following features:
Processor: Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 1
Display: 6.58 in (16.71 cm), 120 Hz FHD+ capacitive multi-touch screen with 2408 x 1080 pixels and 20:9 ratio
Battery: 5000 mAh with 18 W fast charging support
Operating system: Funtouch OS 12 based on Android 12
Cellular technology: 5G
Rear camera: 50 MP + 2 MP macro
Front camera: 8 MP
Dimensions: 75.84 mm x 164.00 mm x 8.25 mm
Weight: 194 g.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G
description: Capture epic moments with the S24 Ultra's pro-grade camera. Power through tasks with the next-gen processor. Immerse yourself in the expansive display. All-day battery life keeps you going.  #Samsung #GalaxyS24Ultra

name: NOTHING PHONE 3
description: The Nothing Phone 3 is rumored to be the next mid-range leader from Nothing, building on the success of Phone 1 and Phone 2.  Expected features include a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 processor, improved camera system, and potentially faster charging or a larger battery. Stay tuned for the official reveal this summer!.

name: IPHONE 13
description: The iPhone 13 delivers a powerful A15 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance, an improved dual-camera system with Cinematic mode for stunning videos, and a bright, beautiful Super Retina XDR display. It also boasts longer battery life and a durable design..

name: iqoo Neo7 Pro
description: The iQOO Neo7 Pro is a powerful and feature-packed smartphone designed for gamers and mobile enthusiasts. It boasts a top-of-the-line Qualcomm Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 processor for smooth performance, a stunning AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate for immersive visuals, and a versatile triple-camera system for capturing high-quality photos and videos.

name: LG WASHING MACHINE
description: LG washing machines are known for their reliability, performance, and innovative features. They offer a variety of capacities, washing cycles, and technologies to meet your specific laundry needs. Some popular features include LG's ThinQ technology for smart connectivity, TurboWash for faster wash times, and LG AI DD for intelligent washing cycles that adjust to the fabric type.

name: LG WASHING MACHINE FULLY AUTOMATED
description: LG offers a wide range of fully automatic washing machines designed for convenience and efficiency. These machines handle the entire washing process, from filling with water to rinsing and spinning, without any manual intervention required. They come in various capacities, washing cycles, and technologies to suit your specific laundry needs. Some popular features include LG ThinQ technology for smart connectivity, TurboWash for faster wash times, and LG AI DD for intelligent washing cycles that adjust to the fabric type.

name: SAMSUNG WASHING MACHINE
description: Samsung offers a wide range of fully automatic washing machines designed for convenience and efficiency. These machines handle the entire washing process, from filling with water to rinsing and spinning, without any manual intervention required. They come in various capacities, washing cycles, and technologies to suit your specific laundry needs. Some popular Samsung washing machine features include EcoBubble™ technology for gentle yet effective cleaning, Digital Inverter Motor for quiet operation and energy efficiency, and SmartThings connectivity for remote monitoring and control.

name: SAMSUNG GALAXY  WATCH 4
description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 is a stylish and feature-packed smartwatch that helps you manage your health and wellness, stay connected, and express your style. It boasts a sleek design with a customizable watch face, advanced health tracking features like blood oxygen monitoring and sleep tracking, and a wide range of apps to keep you informed and entertained.

name: SAMSUNG REFIGRATER WITH DIGITAL INVERTER
description: The Xiaomi Mi TV 4A 32" is a great choice for budget-minded users who want a smart TV with essential features. It features a 32-inch HD display, a quad-core processor, and runs on the PatchWall UI for a user-friendly experience.

name: LG REFIGRATER WITH AI FEATURES
description: The LG InstaView ThinQ Refrigerator offers a luxurious blend of convenience and innovation. Knock twice on the InstaView panel to see inside without opening the door. LG ThinQ with AI helps maintain optimal temperature, monitor for potential issues, and even connects to smart speakers for voice control. This refrigerator boasts a Smart Cooling System for consistent temperatures and a Craft Ice™ Maker for unique slow-melting ice cubes, perfect for entertaining.

name: SAMSUNG QLED TV
description: The Samsung QN90A Series represents the pinnacle of Samsung's QLED technology. The Neo QLED display utilizes a Mini LED backlight for unmatched brightness, contrast, and detail. Object Tracking Sound Pro delivers the most immersive audio experience to date, while the powerful Neo Quantum Processor provides advanced upscaling and AI capabilities for exceptional picture quality.

name: TCL SMART TV
description: The tcl Series represents the pinnacle of Samsung's QLED technology. The Neo QLED display utilizes a Mini LED backlight for unmatched brightness, contrast, and detail. Object Tracking Sound Pro delivers the most immersive audio experience to date, while the powerful Neo Quantum Processor provides advanced upscaling and AI capabilities for exceptional picture quality.

name: Canon EOS 90D (DSLR)
description: The Canon EOS 90D is a powerful and versatile DSLR camera ideal for enthusiast photographers. It boasts a 32.5 megapixel APS-C CMOS sensor for high-resolution images, a DIGIC 8 image processor for fast performance and low-noise shooting, and a 45-point all-cross-type autofocus system for quick and accurate focus tracking. The EOS 90D also features a 100% viewfinder for a classic shooting experience, a vari-angle touchscreen LCD for creative composition, and 10fps continuous shooting for capturing fast-action moments. It can shoot stunning 4K UHD videos at up to 30fps.

name: MACBOOK AIR
description: The new MacBook Air with the M2 chip delivers powerful performance in a thin and light design. Featuring a stunning Liquid Retina display, long battery life, and a variety of color options, it's the perfect choice for work, creativity, and entertainment on the go.

name: Dell G15 5520 Gaming Laptop
description: The Dell G15 5520 is a powerful and affordable gaming laptop featuring a 12th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 30 Series Laptop GPU, and a 15.6-inch FHD display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
